single.searchString: index="oidemo" sourcetype="business_event" (orderType=NewActivation OR orderType=AddLOS) $network_provider$ $plan_type$ | bin _time span=1m | stats count by _time, marketCity, orderType, networkProviderName, phoneName, phoneType, planDescription, planPrice, planType | stats sum(count) as count | rangemap field=count low=3000-15000 elevated=2000-2099 severe=0-1999 default=low

index="oidemo" sourcetype="business_event" (orderType=NewActivation OR orderType=AddLOS) $network_provider$ $plan_type$ | bin _time span=1m | stats count by _time, marketCity, orderType, networkProviderName, phoneName, phoneType, planDescription, planPrice, planType | stats avg(planPrice) as ARPU | eval ARPU=round(ARPU,2) | rangemap field=ARPU low=0-49 elevated=50-59 high=60-69 severe=70-100 default=low

index="oidemo" sourcetype="business_event" (orderType=NewActivation OR orderType=AddLOS) $network_provider$ $plan_type$ | bin _time span=1m | stats count by _time, marketCity, orderType, networkProviderName, phoneName, phoneType, planDescription, planPrice, planType | search phoneType=iPhone | stats sum(count) as count | rangemap field=count low=3000-15000 elevated=2000-2099 severe=0-1999 default=low

index="oidemo" sourcetype="business_event" (orderType=NewActivation OR orderType=AddLOS) $network_provider$ $plan_type$ | bin _time span=1m | stats count by _time, marketCity, orderType, networkProviderName, phoneName, phoneType, planDescription, planPrice, planType | search phoneType=Android | stats sum(count) as count | rangemap field=count low=3000-15000 elevated=2000-2099 severe=0-1999 default=low

index="oidemo" sourcetype="business_event" (orderType=NewActivation OR orderType=AddLOS) $network_provider$ $plan_type$ | bin _time span=5m | stats count | rangemap field=count low=3000-15000 elevated=2000-2099 severe=0-1999 default=low

chart.title: Activations by Minute - Last 2 Hours
chart.searchString: index="oidemo" sourcetype="business_event" (orderType=NewActivation OR orderType=AddLOS) | fillnull value="" marketCity networkProviderName orderType phoneName planDescription planPrice planType | search $network_provider$ $plan_type$ | eval last2Hours=if(_time>relative_time(now(), "-2h"), 1, 0) | bin _time span=1m | stats count by _time, last2Hours, marketCity, orderType, networkProviderName, phoneName, phoneType, planDescription, planPrice, planType | search last2Hours=1 | timechart fixedrange=false span=1m sum(count)

chart.title: Activations by Hour - Today
chart.searchString: index="oidemo" sourcetype="business_event" (orderType=NewActivation OR orderType=AddLOS) | fillnull value="" marketCity networkProviderName orderType phoneName planDescription planPrice planType | search $network_provider$ $plan_type$ | eval last2Hours=if(_time>relative_time(now(), "-2h"), 1, 0) | bin _time span=1m | stats count by _time, last2Hours, marketCity, orderType, networkProviderName, phoneName, phoneType, planDescription, planPrice, planType | timechart span=1H sum(count)

chart.title: Activations by Hour - One Week Prior
chart.searchString: index="oidemo" sourcetype="business_event" (orderType=NewActivation OR orderType=AddLOS) $network_provider$ $plan_type$ | bin _time span=5m | timechart span=1H count
